General Info Commands: Shows all the information about a character.

yes top
yes top points
yes top dallars
User Info Commands:
yes teams
yes teams select [teamNumber]
yes teams add/remove [teamNumber] [characterName]
Commands: Enables a command or command group.

enable util
enable Utility
enable prefix

enable-command
cmd-on
command-on
enablecommand
cmdon
commandon
Disables a command or command group.

disable util
disable Utility
disable prefix

disable-command
cmd-off
command-off
disablecommand
cmdoff
commandoff
Reloads a command or command group.
Utility: Shows or sets the command prefix.

prefix
prefix -
prefix omg!
prefix default
prefix none
Checks the bot's ping to the Discord server.
